title: Run-heavy Steelers aim for balance with Rodgers
description: Steelers offensive coordinator Arthur Smith said he hopes last year's run-heavy offense can transition into more of a run-pass balance under new quarterback Aaron Rodgers.
author: Brooke Pryor

title: Sources: Mavs join in denying Knicks' requests
description: The Knicks have now been denied permission to speak with Dallas Mavericks coach Jason Kidd, Timberwolves coach Chris Finch and Rockets coach Ime Udoka, sources confirmed to ESPN.
author: Shams Charania

title: Mum thinks Bellingham can be repulsive but I see special boy - Tuchel
description: Thomas Tuchel says anyone unhappy with Jude Bellingham's on-field attitude - including the German's mother - do not know the "special boy".

title: Trivia-busting Rabada joins elite Lord's club of two
description: South Africa fast bowler Kagiso Rabada joins an elite Lord's club of two, thanks to a five-wicket haul in the World Test Championship final.

title: Tuchel: My mum thinks Bellingham's behaviour can be repulsive
description: Thomas Tuchel has admitted his own mother thinks Jude Bellingham's on-pitch temperament "can be a bit repulsive", but insists the midfielder is "special".

title: Man City complete £46.3m Reijnders deal
description: Manchester City have completed the £46.3m signing of midfielder Tijjani Reijnders from AC Milan.

title: Contract details for rookie DL Walter Nolen III and what people are saying about him
description: Howard Balzer breaks down Nolen's rookie deal and shares what people are saying about the Cardinals' first-round pick.

title: Yankees pitcher shifts tone as role remains uncertain after rehab start
description: The $18 million righty says he is open to "any" role now.
